meanings.sent1: The magical creature was summonable by the wizard's spell.
meanings.sent2: The genie in the lamp was summonable whenever someone rubbed it.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to think it was summonable whenever it heard the sound of a can opener.
meanings.sent4: The ancient spirits were summonable only during a full moon ritual.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's powers were summonable at will, making him unbeatable in battle.

meanings.sent1: The emergency services were summonable at any hour of the day.
meanings.sent2: The loyal dog was always summonable by its owner's whistle.
meanings.sent3: The robot butler was so efficient that it was summonable for any task.
meanings.sent4: The ancient deity was summonable by performing a sacred chant.
meanings.sent5: The special forces team was summonable for top-secret missions that required their expertise.
